p: Digestibility coefficients of HSC are comparable to SBM and canola meal ( Table 6). Hempseed cake has low NDF degradability ( in sacco) because of its high indigestible NDF (iNDF; 409 g/kg DM) fraction ( 17, 110) which might be different in vivo. Although HSC has high EE ( Table 2), which contributes to ME, fermentable energy to facilitate microbial growth is derived from fermentable carbohydrates ( 111).
